div.p: This is a submission to the 2023 Game Off event hosted by GitHub on itch.io, It's a game developed using Zig and Raylib. It was created by @dylanlangston.

blockquote.p: Game Off is GitHub's annual game jam challenging individuals and teams to build a game during the month of November. Use whatever programming languages, game engines, or libraries you like. You're also welcome to use AI tools to help generate code, assets, or anything in between! The theme for this year's jam is SCALE!
The theme for this year's jam is SCALE!

div.p: My interpretion of the theme is a vertical platformer that is procedurally generated.
